version_description:
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
Thank you for your feedback so far. If you have any suggestions please visit luno.com/help

• Luno is now available in 40 countries across Europe, Africa and Asia! Buy Bitcoin instantly in the United Kingdom, France, Italy, Spain, the Netherlands and many more!
• Fixed a bug in QR code scanning on the previous version.

• Luno is now available in 40 countries across Europe, Africa and Asia! Buy Bitcoin instantly in the United Kingdom, France, Italy, Spain, the Netherlands and many more!
• Fixed a bug in QR code scanning on the previous version.
• Luno is now available in 40 countries across Europe, Africa and Asia! Buy Bitcoin instantly in the United Kingdom, France, Italy, Spain, the Netherlands and many more!
• Luno is now available in 40 countries across Europe, Africa and Asia! Buy Bitcoin instantly in the United Kingdom, France, Italy, Spain, the Netherlands and many more!

• We've made it easier for you to deposit money into your Luno wallet by highlighting common problems such as incorrect reference numbers and SEPA payment integration
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thank you for your feedback so far. If you have any suggestions please visit luno.com/help

We are excited to announce that Ethereum is now available on Luno!

Ethereum is another digital currency, similar to Bitcoin, that has exploded in price and popularity in recent months. You can now buy, store and learn about Ethereum with Luno.

We are excited to announce that Ethereum is now available on Luno!

Ethereum is a digital currency, similar to Bitcoin, that has exploded in price and popularity in recent months. You can now buy, store and learn about Ethereum with Luno.

This release also includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you for your feedback so far. If you have any suggestions please visit luno.com/help

We are excited to announce that Ethereum is now available on Luno!

Ethereum is a digital currency, similar to Bitcoin, that has exploded in price and popularity in recent months. You can now buy, store and learn about Ethereum with Luno.

This release also includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you for your feedback so far. If you have any suggestions please visit luno.com/help

• We've launched our ETH/BTC exchange! You can now trade between Ethereum and Bitcoin
• You can now monitor the Ethereum price by setting Ethereum price alerts
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thank you for your feedback so far. If you have any suggestions please visit luno.com/help
Want to learn more about Bitcoin or Ethereum? Visit luno.com/learn

• Ability to improve privacy by setting the app to lock when it is closed
• Full iPhone X support including in-app notifications
• Improved designs to in-app notifications
• Updated UI and in-app help for the personal details form
• New look and feel for the PIN field
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thank you for your feedback so far. If you have any suggestions please visit luno.com/help

In 6.0.0 (2019-08-08)
• Enjoy an updated look and feel with new illustrations and animations
• A bottom navigation bar replaces the side menu making it easier to use the app
• See the price chart at a glance from our simplified home screen
• Set the Exchange as your default home screen in your profile settings
• Get the latest industry news in the Explore section
Thanks for your feedback. If you have any suggestions please visit luno.com/help
Want to learn more about crypto? Visit luno.com/learn

In 6.1.0 (2019-09-16)
• Improved accessibility and design of Exchange graphs
• Orders can be placed from anywhere on the Exchange
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
Thanks for your feedback. If you have any suggestions please visit luno.com/help
Want to learn more about crypto? Visit luno.com/learn

In 6.2.0 (2019-10-23)
• Improved invite-a-friend screen makes it easier to earn rewards
• BCH is now available for instant buying and selling
• New and improved currency selector
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
Thanks for your feedback. If you have any suggestions please visit luno.com/help
Want to learn more about crypto? Visit luno.com/learn
